Sometimes I question the reason for life. I've talked to people who say that really we're just here because we're a mistake. And I mean evolutionists. I think people who believe in evolution have no faith whatsoever, or self confidence. They don't like to think that there is a higher being, whatever/whomever it may be. They try hiding their imperfections by saying they believe in evolution, basically stating that they are superior to someone else.


We just didn't get here because of two molecules happening to go through physical mutations to become humans. No no no. Anyone who believes in that is sadly mistaken. We are here, because the Creator loves us, and wanted to make something of his kind.


The Creator- Who is he/she? I know what I believe, but I'm not completly sure that I'm correct. Everyone close to me knows my spiritual views, even though they might not be right. I love being mortal, and being able to wake up everymorning and realize that what I have is a gift- I get to breathe, walk, and I have the ability to be whatever I want to be.


I also get a chance for another life; but I'm not sure how to get it. I'd love to be able to find out, because eternal bliss would give me reason. Reason for the pain I've been through, as well as the pain I've inflicted on others. My ex boyfriend, who is a wonderful smart person once told me that just by standing next to someone in an elevator can change someones life. He's exactly right. I've caused people pain, and they've done the same to me. I can't count how many times Brandon has broken my heart, god it's been so many times. Leah- Oh yeah she's done it many times before. Shit happens, people move on and they get over it.


Pain- and no I'm not talking about the bull shit people do when they cut their arm. I'm talking about real pain; emotional. We've all experienced it. Some more than others. Sometimes I feel like I'm the only one who's ever really felt something. Most of the time I can talk to someone about it, and they seem like they understand, but I know they really don't. I can't talk to Brandon about a lot of things because I know he wouldn't understand. I'd give him a try, but I'm certain he wouldn't. Leah- I've told Leah about a lot of things, and I've told her more things than I've ever told anyone, but it always feels like someone comes along and ruins our relationship. Leah isn't threatened by Brandon, I know that, because she knows I'm never choosing over them, but when it comes to other people, she has to choose. 


I am no longer going to be in second place with everyone else, and I don't want to always feel like I'm second best. So you all know what? I'm not dealing with it anymore. I don't want a lot of friends, who I can't trust- I want A friend who I can trust and talk to about everything, and show understanding with everything I say. Is that too much to ask? I don't think so. Stop complaining about my attitude, because I don't have one. Think I have one? That's fine with you, but from now on, I set my own rules.


I am who I am, and you're never going to change me.

Today was dull.

Zak and I got into a physical fight today.  I was walking to the bus with Cayla and I go, "Mommy, is that a real mall goth?" and she starts to giggle, and he flicks me off, and I yell, "Kiss my ass!" So he drops his bag and goes, "GLADLY!", came after me, grabed my hands so I couldn't hit him and started shoving/pushing me.  He kinda hurt my chest... ass hole.

I hate mall goths.
Hey, a reminder... Courtney Love killed Kurt Cobain.

She hangs her head low, 
sick of her everyday show. 
Holding tight and letting looose 
what is what and whose are whose. 

She runs so far away from life 
And her only resource is her knife. 
While running the blade across her skin, 
she prays to god its deep enough in. 
to kill, to take, to help her let go. 

The burn begins, the flow is coming. 
It inches up from bewteen the cracks of her crust. 
She dares to look at the knife. So full of blood and rust. 
Theres no one in this world she could ever try to trust. 

The scarlet red pushes its way out of the skin. 
She knows this painful process is a full fledged sin. 
Like a splinter, her words thrust her way out of her head. 
Throwing themselves onto her bloodstained letter. 

She says goodbye one last time. 
She could fall in love with the veiw of the world at sunset, 
but she leaves the veiw to the rats, 
and hurry's back. 

Her world fades, her eyes close 
for once shes happy. 
For there are no more every day shows, 
in store for her. 

I found this poem.  I thought it was beautiful, so I thought I'd post it.

Ah, today was wonderful. I'm on these new pills, and they kind of spaz me out... So I haven't been myself. 


Today was fucking sweet at school. Second peroid math, Mrs. Isaaics asked me for a number and I was like, "Nahh..." She goes, "Lindsay, give me one." So yeah, being Linds and all I go, "69", and Cayla started cracking up... Then Mrs. Isaaics was talking about how 69 just repeats itself over and over... Jolly good.


P.E. We played some stupid hockey game, but I was somewhat bored by it. I didn't like it. Tiffy and I talked a little, but I mean I was spazzing and talking out of my ass, and something was wrong. I think I have an idea, but I won't say anything. Hope she's okay.


This spanish girl wants to kick my ass, because she was being stupid and didn't watch where she was going. Ha, stupid wench. I told my friend Pamela what she said and Pam goes, "You should have said something like, 'Well it fixed your face.'" God I was cracking up. Anywho.


LUNCH! OMG THAT WAS FUCKING FUNNY! Cayla and I were in line, and Lauyra and KP come up and KP goes, "HEY YOU KNOW WHAT'S STUPID?! LESBIANS!" Right as Cayla and I were hugging... And Cayla told me but I thought she heard wrong. Sthilly me. 


So I was bright today, and decited that I should make a scene with KP. The plan was we were going to go over and talk to JAMES, and say, "HEY JAMES, YOU KNOW WHAT'S WORSE THAN LESBIANS?!...... PUNKS!" But KP beat me to it. He said the lesbian thing again, and I got mad and looked at him and said, "What the fuck is your problem with lesbians?" Then he was all defensive like, "I was just kidding!" But we all know he wasn't.

Yeah, I stole this from Ioana, who got this from Mike, but they're different results.
Yours are DEMON wings, possibly resembling
those of a bat - huge, black, and clawed. You
are cold and impure, and a born Creature of the
Night. Possibly with an interest in those of a
vampyric nature, or possibly one yourself. You
have little sympathy or care for humanity and
see them as existing for no real purpose -
thus, you can be very manipulative and bend
them to fit YOUR purpose. And you do have a
purpose, to everything you do. Nine times out
of ten it will be strictly for your own self
gratification or perhaps merely amusement. As
soon as a person or situation is no longer
productive or pleasurable in your life, you
will rid yourself of it or them. You could very
well have just a touch of superiority complex
(or perhaps more than a touch?). Despite all of
this, you are capable of love so intense that
you place that person's wishes even above your
own - the only time that you will do so.
Chances are you are attracted to people in
which you see...yourself. Though many hate you
for your carelessness and evil...Sexy, fierce,
sinful, and mysterious...you turn me on.

*~*~*Claim Your Wings - Pics and Long Answers*~*~*
brought to you by Quizilla That is so me.

You know what pisses me off? People. Yes, people. I go to IRC chat to talk to a few people, and who's in there? Brandon. What's Brandon doing? Probably sucking up to one of those stupid power hungry bitchy mods. I fucking hate them. Okay, so here's what happened. 


I get in there and said I was sorry to Lycan and Morgana for being bitchy and pissy or whatever. Lycan said that that isn't why she's mad. She said I disrespected Christopher and werewolf.com. Did I disrespect werewolf.com? Fuck no, I said shit about a few of the mods, but nothing about the actual site. Before they were even there, the site was way better. Meaning back in the day.


Also, I would like to announce for Leah, and the whole world to see, so that when/if Leah gets blamed for this, it would be complete and utter bull shit. Lycan is spreading rumors that Leah is telling Syrid to hack the IRC chat. Um, pardon me, Syrid has a mind of his own, and does whatever the fuck he wants. He takes orders from no one. For all you people who got e-mails from him, suck it up, get over it, because if Leah can, your drama hungry asses can get over it too. 


Leah- Also, we're being "watched" on para-scape.com, so everything we say is being watched by some skanky bitch with no life. Just keep that in mind. Oh, the reason I couldn't answer the phone is because my mom was on the other line, and I didn't know if it was too late to call back, so I didn't. I'll probably call you later today... To see if you're even alive. :p


Anyways, on to real problems, I still can't find my wallet. Why you ask? Prehaps I left it at Morgans, and he just doesn't want to tell me. Yeah, I asked him if he had it and he said he didn't. Shucks. My mom says it will show up when I least expect it, but yeah, what the fuck ever. That never happens with me.


Basically this was another little short rant. I swear, people blame my sister and I for everything, and as I've said before, it's because of our hair. Jealous mother fuckers. Or is it because Leah and I are youthful, and crazy biotches who don't give a shit what some stupid fuck over the internet says? I don't know. Maybe it's all the above, but one thing's for sure, Leah and I are never going to change ourselves to please another being.


Leaving you people, with no life who sit at the computer all day stalking people from a werewolf website over to a paranormal website, with one little message. Silence is bliss, and it'd be nice if you'd shut your traps for once.

Here I am, sitting in werewolf irc chat waiting for people to come in. God I wish the old gang was around, we used to have so much fun together. Those were truely the good old days of werewolf.com


I got my Valentines Day cards! I plan on giving everyone one, even though I don't like them. It's nice to make people smile, I like it. Cayla's gonna love hers... I know it.


Last night I went out with my friend Danielle and her 2 friends. I have never been more uncomfortable in my life. Okay, here I am, "Dark Angel" as my mom calls me sometimes, and they they all are, preppy blondes. Danielle and I go way back to 5th grade, so hanging around with her doesn't bother me at all. Her 2 friends we so preppy, I thought I was going to suffocate.


You know when you watch those television shows, with blondes on them that act completely ditzy and stupid, and you think to yourself, "Gee, I've never actually met a blonde THAT stupid..." Well guess what, I MET 2! I was scared, I was uncomfortable, and I didn't know what to do. 


So the plan was, we were going to some Super Bowl party and just fuck around. The stupid people "forgot" to e-mail Danielle and tell her it was going to be postponed. So we don't really have any idea of what to do. Danielle finally decited that we should go to diner and think about what we were going to do afterwards. We get to the Hard Rock Cafe, and order. Let me tell ya, those 2 girls have got to be the pickiest people I have ever met in my life. They're skinny, scared of meet or fried foods, and they were really tempting me to rip their fucking heads off. Yeah, so they're sitting there picking at their food, and they hardly eat ANYTHING. It was like 20 dollars wasted on nothing. I took mine home for my mom, so my mom ate half of it. At least someone did. You know? 


The plan was we were going to the Reston Town Center afterwards, but then they decited it was "too cold". Biggest fucking babies I have ever met. So I go home. Thank Jesus. I couldn't stand to be with those blondes much longer. I was going crazy.


Get home, get in my pajamas and of course I forgot to wash my makeup off. Silly me, so I went to bed being the perfect Princess of Death. How lovely.


Ever come across something, that it's just so beautiful, so elegant, so majestic you just couldn't even believe your eyes? It doesn't have to be a person exactly, it could be a piece of artwork, prehaps a poem someone wrote for you, even a song would due. 


I can say the little simple things to be are beautiful. The pure relationship between humans in my eyes is truely beauty. I find it lovely how 2 people can love each other so much, and care for each other, as if they were as fragile as a porclien doll. I hope one day I'll be able to be with the person who will know how to handle a relationship, and understand that my heart can be shattered, torn, and broken. I want to be with someone who will love me when I'm angry, kiss me when I'm sad, hold me when I'm scared. It's the simple things in life, that make me happy, and if few would look past certain obstacles, they would see that I'm not a rock, I am a glass figure...


Well I leave you with this wonderful and beautiful poem, which my sister Gothic Rouge wrote. Ciao.


Sitting, Rocking, silently she stares, 

Slowly emptiness seems inevitable. 

No light shines through, darkness will prevail. 

Crying these black tears of immortality 

Her soul is weeping, it's dieing... 

The angelic wings stream with the tears, 

Black soon turns to red as mortality embraces her. 

Soft whimpers pass her lips muttering, 

Endless breath laced with venom, 

Venom for which burns her blood. 

Death is no longer fear, 

It's life... 

How much longer must she wait? 

Sitting, rocking, silently but no longer staring. 

Time stands still as she falls, 

Falls from her chair... 

Her body shatters like a fragile doll. 

The pieces glisten with frost, 

But they are still warm like flesh. 

Blood, mortal blood starts to cry, 

From what once was a girl, 

Now...glass pieces of a doll.

So yeah, school fucking sucks. 4 of my teachers want a meeting with my mom, and themselves. My mom says that they say I disrupt the class, don't pay attention, and don't do my work. A)I don't fucking disturb Mrs. Zablotney. She's a fucking bitch. She's always yelling at me, Zak, Cayla, or Tiffany about something. Andy sings, guess who gets in trouble. I DO! I'm fucking sick of her fat ass always getting mad at me for something I didn't do. The other day Cayla, Zak, and I were sitting together and Nadia was talking and I asked Cayla to borrow a pen and Mrs. Zablotney fucking goes, "Lindsay, Zak, Cayla, stop talking." WHEN FUCKING LAUREN, NADIA, AND MANAZ WERE TALKING! God the fucking nerve of her fucking ass. I'm sick of it. 


My drama teacher doesn't like me either. I had to take a one semester course with him, and that I did not like. Faggot.


I don't know who else doesn't like me. Mother says 4, but right now I can only think of 2. I try my hardest to shut up in school, just because stupid ass public school kids don't know how to keep their god damned mouths shuts. 


So yeah, my mom is pissed at me because of this, and what did I do wrong? Nothing. God, I'm so sick of her ass blaming me for shit I don't even do. She goes, "Why don't you get a fucking boyfriend and get laid. That should take off some of the stress." Ummm, excuse me bitch, I think I can choose for myself when I want to fucking have sex, but thanks for trying to tell me what to do. 


Same goes for my stupid brother. The other day she called and was like, "Where's your brother?" I said, "I don't know, out with his friend I think. This morning he came over and said 'why are you home?' and I just told him to go away, but he hasn't called or anything." She goes, "Hmmmmm, that's interesting..." with contempt. And I said, "Ummmm no it's not, but I'm going to go now, I'll tell you if he calls." I had fucking homework to do, and she's annoying me with Nick. So then she bitches on at me because she said I had a "whatever" attitude. I'm so fucking tired of her blaming me for shit everyone else does.


She's constantly bitching about how I have problems. Always saying I'm so depressed, obsessive compulsive, blah de fucking da. This is what happens, when you fuck someone you don't give a shit about. You have two kids, usually blame the oldest because she was the first mistake in the whole process, and then the kids have to suffer because of this. Is this fair? Of course not. I have been put in mental hospitals, had needles stuck through my fucking arm, had brain scans, because my MOTHER is a crack whore. 


Oh, and I wasn't just put there for no reason. I used to cut myself, break things, and use the class to cut myself right infront of her. Where did I learn it from? Her. She's a stupid bitch, and knows that when you show something to a kid of 7 years old, they'll probably do it. So here I am, 7 years old, cutting myself, breaking things, and whatever. So my stupid bitch mother thinks it's "okay" to put a 7 year old in a mental hospital. Then they put me on lithium, took blood, put medicine through my veins, made me take 5 pills a day, they made me eat, and then on top of that I had school there. And it's sad to think my mom wonders why I have so many problems. 


She always says I try and play a victum in everything. People who actually know me would say otherwise. My mom doesn't know me at all, and I hardly talk to her. I get free internet, because she's too much of a cheap whore to get me my own, so I get mine free. Clothes? Of course I buy them. CD's, soda, books, shit for school, I buy it myself. Oh, but when it comes to Nick, he gets everything in the world. I don't need "things" to keep me happy, just the simple shit like school, I rather not pay for. Then I go to school, and people hate me because I'm "goth", which I'm not.


She's also one of those people, who tries to act nice around other people. When my friends are here she plays the sweet inocent mother every kid wants. So all my friends think she's nice, but when I tell them she's actually a bitch, they just say don't say that about her. Sad isn't it? At home, I'm constantly being nagged on, and at school they always blame me for shit I don't do. People wonder why I've tried to kill myself? Why I have mood swings, when in fact, they're not mood swings. It just usually means something's happened. Sometimes I wish that some stupid shit would come to school and shoot me because they think I'm Satanist. That way I wouldn't have to come home to my mother. Or, sadly, if I lived she'd probably bitch at me because she'll think I made the kid do it for some stupid reason. Oh well, karma will catch up with her soon.


And my mother wonders why I have so many problems...

Okay, I figure now that time has passed, I need to make a new cast.


Brandon~ My love, my everything. I fuck up a lot, and he doesn't make me feel like everything I do is a mistake. He makes me happy, and I don't think I could live without him.


Jen~ The Whore. I suppose it's a tad harsh, but yeah, she is. None the less, one of my best friends. Goiing on two years now! Woohoo.


Fifi~ My reality check. I love Fifi, she's always there when I wanna talk to her. She's been my best friend going on the 7th year. I wouldn't have it any other way.


Cayla~ Also known as Spanky. One of my newest friends, but also one of the coolest people out there. Sthilly, exciting, and she's a huge flirt... ;)


Tiffy~ Also known as Orange. I love Tiffy. She's one of those friends you go to for advise, and guidance. She's a nice person to talk to and she understands my feelings. Gotta love the Tiffy.


Zak~ Also known as Lemon. Ah yes, one of my only good male friends, I guess. He's a big weener, but still a good guy.


Ioana~ Also known as Bubbles. Cute girl. Love her, she's awesome. She understands my Johnny fettish. She's so sexy...


Laura~ Patricks girlfriend. We didn't start off on good terms, but as time went on, I think we became a tad closer. Friends? That is yet to be determined but I'd like to get closer to her.


Riley~ Monkey Man! We're always arguing over who's moneky is better than the others. I guess I'll let him win this round. ;)


Patrick~ Instigator. Honestly there is more to say then to type. He's a kick ass mother fucker.


Leah~ My sister. We have tons in common, we like gossping, and we both are into the same hobbies. What better sister could ya ask for? Truely one of my best friends, and favorite family member. :)


Mykel~ Number One Weener. Gotta love The Mike. He's fucking awesome, has the best humor ever... and I love how he says things to your face and doesn't hide his negative feelings. Ass cream, ice cream worth a shit. ;)


Dani~ Sexy biotch. I love Dani, she's fucking awesome, and now that she's married... I think I'm going to have to make plans for babysitting in the near feature. ;)


Danielle~ Best friends for life. We can talk about anything, we know almost everything about eachother. Guys, guys...guys... and guys. Heehee, it's truely an awesome friendship we have.


I don't think I forgot anyone, but if I did, I'm sorry. I love all you guys! (Scary thought, is it not?)

I detest you,

I want you, 

Like a breath that is Haggard ...hushed. 


I'll Make you, 

...And break you. 

A malignant, stagnant rush. 


I taste you, 

...And spit you. 

Poison is this crush. 


I watch you, 

...And stalk you. 

Lust fuels a virgin's blush. 



What lies behind those liquid pools, 

Hued of the finest brandy... 


Creamed decadence flows past my lips 

your taste...bittersweet candy... 


Come coil your darkness, around my thighs, 

Unfurl wicked delights upon me... 


Beckon the nectar from my wounds... 

A Tourniquet....cut free... 


I crave you, 

I torture you,

With velvet words and lies...


I'll tempt you, 

I'll keep you, 

Mock your pitious cries...


I tease you, 

And slice you, 

To a shredded pile. 


I'll damn you, 

And free you, 

My beauty,dark and vile... 


I hide you, 

And force you, 

Fully in the light... 


I'll wake you, 

And ride you, 

A dozen darkened nights... 



I love you, 

I taunt you, 

Keeping you at bay.. 


I rule you, 

Mold you, 

You'd have it no other way...

I have a feeling this is going to be a long one...


Last night I went out with my friend. Things were okay. I talked to a lot of my friends last night, and just kinda gave Morgan the cold shoulder. He deserves it, but that's another story.


My friend Jen, as you all should know, is a huge flirt. It pisses me off more than anything, because she doesn't listen to me about anything. One of these days she's going to get raped, and all I'm going to say is, "Told ya so". Whatever she gets, she deserves it.


I have this other friend, she's a chick... I don't talk about her a lot but her name is Sarah. Lately Sarah has been making me feel like shit. She doesn't like the way I have my hair one day, she doesn't like my makeup, she doesn't like my shirts, and she thinks that I'm just a fucking flaw in the universe. It's like everything I do, she always has to be ahead of me. There was one point in our friendship where she said she didn't like this guy that I liked, and then the next thing I know, she goes out with him. She's constantly making me look bad infront of people, and franky I'm getting sick of it. I want to just go up in her face and smash out her teeth, but I can't. It's also whenever I go out with someone, she's always saying, "Oh, my boyfriend's better" when honestly, my last relationship I was in, I really cared about him... a lot. I mean, so much... and she doesn't understand that I have feelings too, but not the same as her. She doesn't even know him and she's saying this about him. I'm sick of playing these games. I want to be happy dressing like me, or acting like me, and not feel like I'm doing something wrong by it. Whatever.


So Brandon. What can I say about Brandon today. He's a weener, but I love him.


So yeah, this week I change classes. My teacher is throwing a "party" because he thought I was scared. Heehee, I love my teacher. He's fucking awesome. 


Tiffy and I are going to be in almost the same glasses, so buckle up dear, it's going to be a long, bouncey ride with The Lindz. ;)


Off to get... a drink! Ciao.
